description.en: Students select one of a set of images as the correct answer.
description.nl: Studenten selecteren een van de afbeeldingen als het juiste antwoord.

settings.name: Multiple choice answer options
settings.description: An array of options objects, with each option being an object with {imageName: string, imageUrl: string, correct: boolean}. The value can contain HTML, the `correct` boolean indicates if the option is correct. There can only be one correct option.
